meanings.definition: The quality or state of being inappropriate.
meanings.sent1: Her constant inappropriatenesses made everyone uncomfortable.
meanings.sent2: The teacher addressed the student's inappropriatenesses in class.
meanings.sent3: His inappropriatenesses at the formal dinner were quite embarrassing.
meanings.sent4: The inappropriatenesses of his jokes left everyone speechless.
meanings.sent5: The inappropriatenesses of her outfit were impossible to ignore.

meanings.definition: Actions or behaviors that are not suitable or proper.
meanings.sent1: The inappropriatenesses of his remarks were evident to all.
meanings.sent2: The HR department had to address the employee's inappropriatenesses.
meanings.sent3: The inappropriatenesses of the dog's barking during the meeting were amusing.
meanings.sent4: Her inappropriatenesses in the workplace were like a ticking time bomb.
meanings.sent5: The inappropriatenesses of his behavior were impossible to overlook.
